summary: An ordinance relating to the plan or system of additions and betterments to, and extensions of, the existing municipal light and power plant and system as specified in Ordinance No. 54006, as amended by Ordinance No. 57856, providing for a chance of maturities as to one series of bond to be issued thereunder, and amending Section 4 of Ordinance No. 54006 as amended by Ordinance No. 57856 accordingly.
